text: A new story about Blake Shelton shopping for a $ 500K ` ` diamond ring'' for Gwen Stefani and proposing on Valentine's Day is made - up. The claim comes from the HollywoodLife, a site that has previously published fake news stories alleging they're already engaged, were getting engaged on Christmas, had a ` ` secret wedding,'' were eloping, and may ` ` never get married'' at all. The blog has also falsely reported a couple of times that Shelton and Stefani have split up. @ gwenstefani / Instagram Basically, the outlet throws everything against the wall, hoping something will stick. And wedged inside its Jenga - like tower of lies, the site contends it's learned its supposed information from sources ` ` close'' to
